name: GenShoku
description:
Welcome to GenShoku. It is a test, of intelligence and skill, perhaps sanity. Your persistence and compliance has been noted. Take a rest. Drink water.

A game made for #BrackeysGameJam 2021, to which the theme was "Stronger Together".

For players not wishing to play in their browser (and in the unlikely event they are using a non-webGL compliant browser) downloadable standalones are provided below. Please be aware that the Mac64 version has been untested due to game jam time restraints and lack of available resources.
